SELECT jt.idx, jt.title, jt.subtitle, jt.hit, ut.nick, GROUP_CONCAT(it.file_path) AS file_paths FROM journal_table jt JOIN image_table it ON jt.idx = it.journal_idx JOIN plan_table pt ON it.journal_idx = pt.idx JOIN user_table ut ON pt.user_idx = ut.idx WHERE jt.status = 0 GROUP BY jt.idx, jt.title, jt.subtitle, jt.hit, ut.nick ORDER BY jt.reg_date DESC
